website_summaries.verdict: A full coverage foundation that lasts all day and is great for dry skin.
pros: Available in 29 different shades with full coverage to cover all imperfections
Moisturizing formula that's great for dry skin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely full coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I had read this is the best drug store foundation, used it the last 2 days in a row. Definitely full coverage! Update: its my 2nd time ordering it I truelly love how great coverage is here is comparison photo: 1 is Milani 2 is Tarte 3 is Fit Me (maybelline)
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally order the wrong shade. So I had to repurchase another one but that was my mistake. I am a very oily girl so this works well on me. It looks a bit caky if you put too much on. For reference my MAC shade is NC35= Milani 06 Sand Beige
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage
customer_reviews.text: I've tried tons of different high value foundations and drug store foundations but this beats them all! Covers absolutely everything and I usually have to set my forehead wrinkles with powder but not now thanks to this. Looks incredibly natural and I've gotten so many compliments. Beyond satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Claudya Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: I trusted a YouTube review, and this is a new "holy grail" foundation. Milani hit the nail on the head with this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite foundations. The color is just right for my light/tan skin. It's easy to apply with fingers, a blender, OR a brush! The coverage is just right. It doesn't mattify my oily skin, but also doesn't need a ton of powder to set it. You can thin it out or add more without it getting cakey. At the very lightest coverage, your skin looks smooth and even, and on the heavier end, it's obvious you're wearing makeup, but in a "your makeup looks lovely" kind of way. It doesn't irritate my skin, clog pores, or get extra oily. The only thing keeping it from perfection, is that it lacks SPF.
customer_reviews.author: ndoll

customer_reviews.title: Best full coverage affordable foundation on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is the most amazing full coverage drug store brand I have ever used! And by no means is my skin as flawless as it appears! I have super red blotchy skin and acne discoloration but let me tell you this covers it all!!!! Holds up well threw out the day and doesn't look cakey or melt in the heat. It's also a thicker highly pigmented cream so it's not runny or watery AT ALL! If your on the fence you MUST give this a shot! Also My skin is very sensitive and acne prone and this doesn't help nor hurt my current skin situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this color looks nothing like it was advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is the color I got when I ordered Creamy Vanilla. Now, based on the images I've seen and based on the container, this color looks nothing like it was advertised. I'm really pale so there was no way for me to work in this color that has such strong orange/yellow undertones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation when mixed
customer_reviews.text: Definitely has a yellowish tone to it (applied to the center of my hand and lightly blended) but not so bad and definitely blends well, especially when mixed but with a slightly lighter foundation. I'm giving this 5 stars because I knew it would have a slightly yellow tone and despite being pale I have a warm undertone rather than a cool so it works for me when blended with a slightly paler shade. Mixed with a drop of Nyx's total coverage foundation, it's the perfect tone for pink undertone redheads! I mostly ordered this because I need something that will stay on in the Texas heat and this definitly accomplished that! Great price. Fast delivery. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Gave me cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: This is not good for humid climates and for people with extremely oily skin. This looks like a mask after being applied. It dries and looks good until the oil begins and actually makes you more OILY than other foundations. It makes me sweat more as well. I also got cystic acne after wearing this. I have never had acne in my 27 years of life. It was horrible, but went away after I stopped wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie-Louise Kirby

customer_reviews.title: no way
customer_reviews.text: Over time by the end of the day the light Vanilla shade turns completely orange like a Donald Trump nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Picatrix5000

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: i really like this foundation the only issue is I have to use another one to get a color that works for my very fair skin. But I love how it looks just wish it came in a lighter shade but either way is a great foundation would recommend but be aware the lightest shade is way to yellow so you'll need to mix it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Horrible foundation. Super cakey and gross feeling, even with powder and setting spray it just feels oily and yuck all day. If you have any acne or spots this makes them even more pronounced instead of "concealing" anything. Do not recommend. I'll go back to buying phoera because it works soooooo much better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacesmumma128

customer_reviews.title: YELLOW and skin irritated!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the promise of full coverage. While it is full coverage, the color “vanilla” which was recommended as the best for us pasty gals, I was left massively disappointed. It’s YELLOW. Straight up yellow. What’s worse is that after a few days of use, for just a few hours at a time and washing my face and using makeup removing wipes to get it off my face, I had a terrible cystic break out allllll along my jaw. Would not recommend, and will not buy again. Giving it two stars because maybe I can use it as an emergency back up for under eye concealer, but only as a last resort as it has ruined my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Primeaddicted

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: Full coverage that really last all day! I have combination skin so a lot of foundations sort of melt off when I get oily. This did not do that. It stayed out all day and still looks great. The pic is after 10 hours at work. A little goes a long way too. I used to much the first time because that’s what I was used to with my last foundation. This will last a long time since it takes so little.
customer_reviews.author: I’m_The_Favorite

customer_reviews.title: Buildable coverage. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Better than expected. Very full coverage and buildable. Ig is zzzebby My bf does photography and I do makeup on the side. I wanted something that would hold up in the cold. This not only stayed on, but I’ve swam with it on and have done pictures too. Beautiful product.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now
customer_reviews.text: Yaaaass definitely a holy grail product for me. -great coverage -light weight feel -holds up well to my oily face -last for the whole day with no touch up -dries up matte -pore-less look -fantastic price -comparable to Estee Lauder double wear
customer_reviews.author: Shelah

customer_reviews.title: Ehh no better then any drug store makeup
customer_reviews.text: Super greasy. The color isn't quite what I expected. You HAVE to set this. It's very cakey in my opinion. I was expecting it to be better then most drug store make up but it was only thicker. The application wasn't any better The quality was watery but thick. You have to use a thick coat or it's sheer that's how you get the good coverage a light coat just won't work. I tired sponge and brush. I just don't really care for this product. Especially the color. Also it's not sealed another thing I don't like. That's gross seal the products. A simple tape would be nice to know it's brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: It's good to know I don't have to break the bank to get a superior product.
customer_reviews.text: I am a deep brown-skinned black woman, and the Chestnut color matched perfectly! A little goes a long way, (I apply with fingers). It's prettiness very reasonably. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: 1stNoel

customer_reviews.title: This  CONCEALER is bomb! 😃
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing this product and it was THE perfect match for my skin tone. It went on smooth and blended well. I will purchase this product again. I’m using less and less product on my face but this is my go to for sure. I’ve used the more expensive brands and always felt as if I’ve been ripped off! I recommend this product for everyday use. It is comparable to the more expensive brands. Smooth application, conceal little imperfections on my skin and leaves that flawless look! Exactly what I wanted. I’m completely satisfied with this product....
customer_reviews.author: Bertha M Wariso

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out
customer_reviews.text: This broke me out which upset me because I had a clear skin streak going when I decided to try this. I was a long time matte but cream user and recently decided that I wanted to switch to a more dewy formula. This made me look oil slick compared to other dewy items I purchased. I did like the coverage. I was using about half the amount of my tarte shape tape concealer for my hyper-pigmentation during the week I was testing this out. If you don't have acne prone skin like I do, I'd say give this a try. Plus the spf is a major bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal coverage
customer_reviews.text: Melani... where do I begin... amazing... it is a cheaper foundation cost wise but coverage is phenomenal I absolutely love my tarte make up but not even tartes foundation covers like this... tarte is the only eye shadow I will buy so I decided to try tarte foundation and it works good but nothing like melani I order mine 3 at a time incase there sold out... it leaves your skin feeling smooth it's not all cakey but still has great coverage..... the shades are perfect with my skin tones
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ridenour

customer_reviews.title: This Makeup is Wonderful! Full coverage, and NO matte look.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many, many foundations but this one is the winner! I'm 73 y.o. and I've been looking for one that covers well, but doesn't look unnatural, and doesn't get into facial lines and pores. I love this one. It spreads evenly, and one pump of the bottle is all you need for full coverage. I love this color too, which is warm beige. I'm sold on this one, and who knew it would be so reasonably priced as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce G

customer_reviews.title: No for extremely oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I use the Becca primer and I am still profusing oil. My pore which are almost inexistent when I don't wear foundation are like, "Hey girl hey" with this foundation. It also oxidizes really dark but this shade was still too light for me and golden toffee is too dark for me. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Nation of Koko

customer_reviews.title: My dry skin appreciated you!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dealing with dry skin and blemish prone. I needed full coverage that did not dry out my skin, and does not feel like I have a pile of goop on my face. Well hello Milani Conceal + Perfect 2-in-1 Foundation! I am biracial and have yellow/golden under tones so I choose the Sand Beige. Blends well, and looks fantastic on! The size of the bottom is terrific for the price and I really feel like for me, this is a great full coverage foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great produt
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! This definitely can be multi use for concealer or foundation and is build able. I like this product, it isn’t as amazing as I thought it would be after Jeffrees video but it is a good product. It just seems to wear down after a long workday. That could also be due to the other products I use as well (moisturizer, sunscreen, coty airspun powder). Will update if I try it with a primer. Sensitive/acne prone skin be cautious as I got a few milia above my eyelids from putting this there. Now I use a different concealer there. Overall great affordable concealer.
customer_reviews.author: k. lawless

customer_reviews.title: Way too orange
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I was told it closely resembled urban decays all nighter foundation and wanted to give it a go. I read the reviews beforehand stating orange like tint, and that this is best for darker toned skin. And I believe, now after receiving the product, these statements are true. I have a very fair porcelain like tone so I chose the lightest shade they had in vanilla. It was wayyy too orange for my skin tone. It has a very sticky feel after application and had high coverage. But the colors are off for me.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Good if you don't mind being orange
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a full coverage foundation. Milani typically has darker foundation and I tried to take this into consideration when buying. At first application the shade was a good match for me, but this foundation oxidized like crazy. I looked about two shades darker and more orange than a caricature of Donald Trump. I suppose there are ways to offset the darkness of the foundation after oxidation, but the orangeness is hard to combat. It's sad because this is a fairly long wearing product with a nice finish, but the oxidation makes it pretty much unwearable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new “go to” for foundation
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Clinique Perfecting foundation for 10 years but wanted to try something a little less expensive. I won’t say cheaper even though it’s a third of the price of the Clinique, because this makeup is awesome. I have many brown spots to cover due to sun exposure and this really is great. I did have to buy 2 different shades to get the right one. Spreads smoothly and just a small amount to get the coverage I need. I am 70 years old for reference
customer_reviews.author: Lorna C

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd purchase of this foundation,I love it,feels fairly light on the skin and I bought another one as I dont want to run out,it works to cover up most my skin blemishes and scars..Goes on smoothly with a damp beauty blender (not wet but rung out after wetting it,makes a much smoother application) I will def stick to this as Its the best I've used in this price range..I dont wear make up often so dont spend a lot on buying it,I definitely recommend this foundation/concealer..It also stays on very well and lasts all day/night till I remove it..my go to for now on
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Born this way foundation dupe!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this concealer. It went on so smoothly and flawlessly. It’s definitely on the more full coverage side without being greasy or making you look “caked”. I’ve watched a lot of tutorials on this concealer as well as the foundation and I can say this pair is a dupe for Urban Decay’s “Born This Way” foundation. The foundation and the concealer are definitely must haves for only being around $8 and $9. It didn’t oxidize on my skin either which is great! And it lasted all day long without spreading or getting patchy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressed
customer_reviews.text: I tried a red reducing foundation at Ulta that had better coverage and ingredients. This is okay for the price. But the Ulta Brand concealer has a natural buildable coverage that looks alot nicer when used as a foundation so I'm sticking to that. Also this color was extremely orange on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup just wish it didnt come off so easy like when sweating etc..
customer_reviews.author: Morningsong

customer_reviews.title: Throw out the rest cause this is the best
customer_reviews.text: Close-up photos provided in different lighting. I'm 50 & finding a foundation that doesn't accentuate the wrinkles & lines isn't a easy task. My makeup bag just got lighter because I found the one. So glad I tried one more time.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jones

customer_reviews.title: You got to try it... Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup!...It took me a long time to find a makeup that I could say I truly would buy it more than once. I'm an older woman..good skin..some ugh.. wrinkles...This is a good makeup and not expensive.Creamy, not greasy feeling ,or heavy. Yes Coverage! Does not look over done.I can not say enough.You do not need alot of it to get results.It feels good on your skin.Thats what I like about it.And as the day goes on ..it has staying power..unbeliveable! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Who?

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter, as it's concealer as well (acne probs), and I decided to try it for myself (46yo) and I'm completely amazed on just how well it covers, and how easy it is to blend. It lasts quite a long time, and without setting into fine lines/lg pores.. I actually just ordered myself one, as i love it more than my favorite Make-up Revolutions Conceal and Hydrate (which is much harder to blend). Definitely the best drug store foundation out there!
customer_reviews.author: T.rok

customer_reviews.title: Wow...what a find!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a really full coverage foundation. This is it. I see there are issues with the vanilla color but the creamy nude is perfect. This stuff is gorgeous! I have quite a bit of sun damage and this completely covers it. Just ordered 4 more bottles. Im a stockpiler!
customer_reviews.author: The Great Leonie

customer_reviews.title: One of the better drugstore foundations
customer_reviews.text: Milani, you were once my favorite but I'm breaking up with you. You gave me great coverage but it didn't last long. You didn't make me break out like the others. I once thought you gave me the softest skin, but you didn't. I found someone better, her name is Phoera and she even costs less than you. Jokes aside, this is my 3rd favorite foundation. If I couldn't order others on Amazon and had to go to a store, this is what I'd pick.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying this product on Amazon, as I usually purchase at CVS. For some reason my face and eyes burned every single time I applied it so I threw it in the trash. I cannot recommend buying here.
customer_reviews.author: A Rose

customer_reviews.title: This is the best so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been Using Milani foundation for about 2 year now. Previous ones were Kat Von D tatoo lock foundation, Clinique liquid foundation, Mac Studio fix, Laura Mercier Soft luminous and I have forgotten much of them. This is the best so far. It is medium coverage and perfect for combination skin like mine. one application is good for the day. i use laura mercier powder on top of this to set it. best thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sisi

customer_reviews.title: but it's a nice foundation. Its definitely a medium to full coverage ...
customer_reviews.text: I would not have this as my holy grail foundation, but it's a nice foundation. Its definitely a medium to full coverage foundation if you build it up. I do not recommend setting your face with powder if you have normal to combo skin. It accentuates a lot of things you don't want to accentuate when you set it with powder. Overall it's a nice foundation, but color match is definitely not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Coverage for days!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Talk about coverage! The product goes on thick, and has amazingly full coverage. I have to admit, this product has better coverage than some high end foundations. On a non BB cream day, this is my go too foundation. The only thing im not in love with is the pump on the bottle. That's it, and not a big thing to me
customer_reviews.author: KLadd82

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I am tired of messing around with foundation so, I bought this one. I only really wear foundation for nights out or professional events so I want my foundation to work for perfection. This one is good, very thick, and a little goes a LONG way. I would recommend adding a little oil/moisturizer to it to make it more spreadable. The biggest negative is that my sensitive skin breaks out almost immediately after I get it off my face. So, I guess that's the price for beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: This product provides good coverage and is easy to blend
customer_reviews.text: I have light colored skin & after looking at swatches online I ordered shade 01 (vanilla). This product provides good coverage and is easy to blend, especially with a stippling brush. I have oily skin, so I do use powder to set, and it keeps creasing/settling to a minimum. This color is a pretty good match for summertime, but will probably be too dark for winter - which makes me sad, because I would definately purchase if they had an appropriately toned lighter shade!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coverage 👌
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I normally just use bb cream because it's light coverage or smashbox or Naked skin foundation on my face. I don't like it to be cakey or heavy and this is pretty good. It's a little thicker than bb cream which is perfect for me because my skin is acne prone and I have pretty large pores and some acne scars. This gave me the coverage I wanted, the perfect amount for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ary

customer_reviews.title: Love this foundation!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best foundations at the drugstore. Full coverage and easy to blend. Lasts all day on my combo 35 year old skin without looking cakey or greasy. I got color porcelain and it works wonderful for my fair light neutral skin tone!
customer_reviews.author: MouthyMama

customer_reviews.title: New type of foundation?!
customer_reviews.text: I found this exceedingly difficult to apply, the foundation apparently comes it what looks like paper sheets that say "Budget Sheet " on the top. When my sponge failed to lift any color from said sheet I decided to try wiping it directly on my face. It ended up covering nothing but on the plus side you couldn't tell I had applied anything at all...WRONG PRODUCT LOL
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gates

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase from this seller again because of their phenomenal customer service!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff, doesn't break me out, and is great on my sensitive skin. Also a product that is light enough for my very pale skin without making me look yellow.
customer_reviews.author: tonton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't bother my sensitive skin, great coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is my number one go-to foundation - - I have bought it several times. The coverage is awesome... I don't use a seperate concealer, just this one product. It doesn't feel particularly thick on my face, but looks natural, smooth and pretty. It blends in really well with my skin and I always get compliments when I'm wearing it. It does come off on fingers/clothes but I think I'm so used to it, the good really outweighs the bad, especially for the price point. I have sensitive skin and eczema and this doesn't aggravate my face at all. Will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie W

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this product. I am very “light” so I ordered “Light BEIGE” and my daughter told me I looked like an orange. It’s definitly not light beige. I would recommend you you look at the shades in store to get an idea. I do love the consistency, And coverage I will try and re purchase it in the Vanilla shade.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Castro

customer_reviews.title: Stop spending $ on anything else!! This is THE BEST***
customer_reviews.text: I have large pores and uneven skin tones. I could have bought a new Mercedes on what I have spent over the years on foundation, concealer, etc. THIS IS THE VERY, VERY BEST...... I BEG YOU TO NEVER STOP PRODUCTION OF THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharae

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this foundation at all. Color wasn't right but also didn't look flawless. Looked heavy, and wasn't super comfortable on the skin. If ur gonna splurge on makeup, foundation is deff the item to do it with. But if u want great drug store price foundation, try L'Oréal lumi. Great foundation!
customer_reviews.author: littledff

customer_reviews.title: In Love.
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. I dont get the crease cracks like I do when I use a primer. Coverage is amazing without feeling like I have makeup on. Doesn't sweat off in Texas heat. Added to my fave list!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Full Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. FULL coverage. I did extractions yesterday & barely needed any concealer today. I also have a cold & have blown my nose multiple times & it has stayed in place very well. I normally need to reapply a setting powder during lunch & have not needed to do that today. I have oily skin normally & this product seems to be the best foundation for that thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Not for porcelain beauties, very orange tinged and thick/pasty texture.
customer_reviews.text: To start, I was so excited to try this foundation out. Normally when I purchase foundation I am the lightest or second lightest shade. Being Swedish I'm quite pale. Ordered the shade vanilla, reading reviews it would work for pale skin, and opened it to find a dark orange shade! I have naturally dry skin as well and this foundation looked horrible over my dry skin (just FYI to those who are also on the dry side). So dissaponted, I really wanted to like this foundation. The best thing about it is probably the cute bottle :(
customer_reviews.author: mynamehere

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf foundation
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go to foundation, I have tried many many brands from very expensive to drugstore discounted, searching for my HG foundation, and I always come back to this Foundation. It is full coverage but does not set on your face like a lot of full coverage foundations do, the only one minor issue was when I first ordered I ordered what normally would have been my correct shade with other brands but it was one shade too deep for me I went back in ordered the medium beige and it was perfect and I can wear the darker shade during the summer so it was a win-win. Can't beat the price. Over all great foundation
customer_reviews.author: glamgirl

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Inexpensive Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different types and brands of foundation, and this one I am liking the best. It goes on very nicely and covers greatly. I ordered 1 that was too dark but luckily the price is very nice so I didn't mind ordering another and I got the right color. It blends well, and lasts all day. I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for cheap full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and this works ok but it's a pretty thick formula. I've noticed that I have to use very very finely milled powder to set this. If I use a powder that's too heavy it will get very cakey as the day goes on and my skin gets polite. The lightest shade still has a really really yellow undertone which works for me ok because my skin has a lot of yellow undertone. But in winter I have to dilute it with a lighter shade. This is also hard to blend. For drugstore it's ok, covers my rosacea pretty well but still too cakey for me to use daily
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It is very very Cakey even when I apply with my beauty blender. Then it gets really patchy. I bought because of Jeffree Stars review, but not liking it at all for my skin
customer_reviews.author: S. LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Not light enough
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a 5 star review if it was not for one thing. I got 01 Creamy Vanilla. I was expecting a light shade what I got was not even close to my skin tone. It was very warm tone much more suited for my roommate. I test swatched even on my hand now have a orangish tint where it was. So I can't even use it but I did my roommate make up with it. It turned out great. Didn't cake with the beauty blender came out just the way I wanted on her. So it got points for that. It covered her rosacea reply well.
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia W.

customer_reviews.title: The makeup itself is great for covering anything
customer_reviews.text: The makeup itself is great for covering anything. The lightest beige color is a little darker than I expected, but after I apply, I use a little of my light concealer over it. My only complaint is the way it is dispensed in the bottle. It should be in a pump or something, When taking the lid off there is a stick applicator that really pulls globs of too much make up out and it gets all over. A pump bottle would be real nice, that would be the only way I would reorder. I will use all I can out of the bottle. Guess will have to dig it out with a cue stick.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This I think is my favorite foundation to use. It has great coverage and lasts all day for me, even if I'm hot and sweaty. Without makeup, my cheeks and chin are bright pink most of the time. This foundation keeps my natural blush hidden. I highly recommend this foundation as it stays put and doesn't feel like you have caked on makeup like some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, comfortable formula
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage and the formula feels great on the skin. The only reason I am taking a star off is because the foundation can look very masky. I was also frustrated with the fact that the color in the photo of the product seems much lighter than the product I received, which ended up having me look like an Oompa Loompa. Amazon unfortunately doesn’t carry the lightest shade in this foundation so from now on I will be ordering it elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Webb

customer_reviews.title: Previous returns????
customer_reviews.text: Outside shipping bubble mailer half open. Products seemed like they were opened because the Milani bottle outside threads were caked with product. I really do hope tthis is not previous returns because someone is going to get infected with something. I was totally discusted with these products sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it but I don't super love it.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is usually pretty dry so I like something moisturizing but this kinda keeps my face shiny all day in a bad way. But for the record I did not get the right color so maybe that has something to do with it. I also don't really appreciate the smell. But for the price it does its job and doesn't really separate or crease that I've noticed. I wouldn't be against giving it a second try but i'm not raving about it just yet.
customer_reviews.author: AvJune

customer_reviews.title: You have to experiment to get the perfect consistency for your skin type.
customer_reviews.text: This foundation if full coverage, a little thick and kind of feels cakey unless you use very little. For ppl with dry skin it might make your dry patches more pronounced and flakier. I found that if I mix it with a little bit of moisturizer or beauty drops it works better.
customer_reviews.author: lizg

customer_reviews.title: Oxidizes & separates
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is terrible :/ it turned yellow on my skin throughout the day and has completely worn off around my nose and chin. My forehead felt tacky and when I touched it, the foundation came off - you can see where it separated and came away. Ugh. If I wasn't at work right now, I'd scrub this off my face immediately. Going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R Tardio

customer_reviews.title: Orange
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ivory shade and look like I use the same self tanner as Trump. In other words, it’s orange on me and I’m glad it was only 8 dollars because of it. Other reviews say it’s orange as well, but I decided to try it out because my sister recommended it. Easy to spread and don’t have to use a lot of get full coverage though.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Best Foundation Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing liquid Foundation I’ve ever tried. It is a great price for it’s quality. Even the Mac Foundation I’ve tried is not as good as this. I have redness and acne scars and nothing has completely covered it like this did. I also have dry skin and this is the only foundation that’s ever made it look so dewy and healthy, not to mention how moisturized it felt.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Choose shade carefully
customer_reviews.text: Too dark for my skin tone. I read reviews & followed what was recommended, not a good idea. Go to their website & follow Those recommendations. I'm Caucasian with warm/yellow /warm undertone. Their website is more specific so it allows you to choose what you think is most likely your tone. Then, I come back to Amazon & order because it's cheaper for a Prime member 😁
customer_reviews.author: David James

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent foundation, it is full coverage and very easy to apply. I apply a small amount on my finger and tap it arounf my face and then blend with a brush, I just press on the lid once and its enough product for my whole face. I have oily skin and it still works well, it doesn't get shiny or come off throughout the day (I apply a setting powder thoug). The price is great, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, weird smell
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to choose a shade online but I just ordered one and hoped for the best. I went with light beige which is a tiny bit darker than my skin tone but I can still make it work without it looking unnatural. It has good coverage and overall I like it but it has a weird smell that I don't like at all. Tell first time I applied it, I was worried I'd be having an allergic reaction because my cheeks got really hot, I was just being paranoid though and nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: MoDa

customer_reviews.title: No more Dior
customer_reviews.text: I was a Dior fan for years... I now officially convert to this. Wow does it cover everything! Glides easily, smooth not sticky. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ILoVeJ

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: My goodness I love this foundation it is so beautiful. It looks so natural and it has such good coverage. I am so happy I found this. I have combination skin and it lasts a really long time and my T zone doesn’t get oily.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, if you need minimum coverage this is perfect, my problem with it was the product broke up on my nose, around my mouth, forehead, I tried all my setting products (spray + powder). Also it oxodisez orange ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty free
customer_reviews.text: I have tried A LOT of foundations and I have to say this one is currently my favorite. The most important quality for me is that it is cruelty free but it is a really great product too. It stays on all day and doesn't get cakey. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Even with my standard makeup routine with a blurring primer it settles in every pore and has broke apart really quickly. I'm going to try a different primer tomorrow just to give it a fair shake but so far I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: Definitely one of my hg!!! Love the formula!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very thick formula that offers the full coverage that you need! I am normally a NC35/40ish and the 04 shade fits me perfectly...although I feel like it does oxidizes but that fades throughout the day. Not to mention, it photographs beautifully! This will definitely be my go to foundation when I want a lot of coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage and finish
customer_reviews.text: I got the lightest shade possible and when it first went on, it seemed dark and somewhat orange. The more I blended it, the better it got and the shade was perfect. It provides decent coverage, but some days I needed a touch up. A little bit goes a long way. Glad I found this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nunn

customer_reviews.title: It was full coverage like I wanted
customer_reviews.text: MEH. It was full coverage like I wanted, but the colors are way off! WHY? It had a major yellow tone to it that was misleading. It also didn't come with a pump, but I've seen YouTube product reviews of this brand/color having a pump? Did I get an old batch? Makes me weary of buying off amazon... I'd never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Developed oily skin. Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This made my skin completely oily/shiny. It was definitely not long wearing as one day of my face to blot the oil, all makeup covered the napkin. This may be ok for dry skin considering it packs a lot of moisture. Also, this did not cover or conceal anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sosgirl1981

customer_reviews.title: Expensive look not price.
customer_reviews.text: This makeup is great It covers like the expensive brands but for much less. Lasts all day and doesn't feel sticky or heavy like the pricey products in major department stores . I hope they never stop making this. 2 products in one for a great price. Love it
customer_reviews.author: vfox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, concealer is very good. Tested by applying on half of my face, and it wore very well for hours.
customer_reviews.author: fiona finkle

customer_reviews.title: Really depends on the person
customer_reviews.text: This foundation oxidizes. I use the lightest shade and when it oxidizes it's perfect for me, but I'm by no means pale or porcelain so others may have difficulty with finding the right color or any color at all that matches. It's a nice foundation and inexpensive, but it transfers a lot, even after powder is applied on top. It provides medium to full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: CShopper

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this makeup it gives a full coverage and has now replace my Clinic full coverage for a fraction of the price. It is great for my aging skin. I Have order a second bottle. It is smooth I use a sponge and am happy with it. It is a full coverage so a little heavy so alittle goes a long way.Sent an order in for a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Emily's

customer_reviews.title: Use with a beauty blender for better results.
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation there just isn’t enough shades. It’s sweatproof and lasts all day. Thicker than most foundations but great because you use less. Covers my redness in one layer.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea Hyde

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best foundations I’ve used very light not like some of the other foundations that are very heavy feeling. Matched my skin tone perfectly (I’m a lighter skin tone) covered most Light marks I have on my face. I really like this product! Not too expensive and it works!
customer_reviews.author: kiki09

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this foundation. Seriously, it is goooorgeous on the skin. The only downside that I have with it is that it's too thick to be applied with a brush without it looking streaky - it requires the use of a blending sponge to apply if you want a smooth application, which is definitely more work than a brush in my opinion. Otherwise, this is very full coverage, buildable, and lasts all day. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fae

customer_reviews.title: Would like more information so can order the correct shade
customer_reviews.text: I got the light beige, which was supposed to be neutral, but it was very orangey on my skin (fair, freckled face). I wish they would give more information on the Amazon page as to what color and tone each shade is.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Big Nope
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and even for me this foundation seemed drying. It settled in to fine lines like crazy and made my under eye very dry and wrinkly looking. Much prefer Revlon colorstay foundation. This goes in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Quality foundation right here
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this product and was not disappointed. The formula is designed for a full-coverage look and blends well into the skin. Using a beauty blender sponge, it looks like natural skin. I wore this to a dinner party hosted by my neighbor, who is a professional make-up artist. She honestly thought I wasn't wearing foundation. This is a high-end quality product at a drug-store price.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Shades are very yellow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with high hopes because of a beauty magazine review. I was disappointed to find it drying and the ivory shade looked very yellow on my face. I can't speak to longevity because I washed it off immediately rather than walk around looking jaundiced.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite foundation by far! Covers everything, easy to blend, nice thick formula for full coverage and the color is perfect. Oxidizes slightly but nothing crazy. Only thing is I wouldnt suggest using it if you have oily skin it's a satin/dewy finish. Either that or set with powder. Lasts all day! Love love love this.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I hit the jackpot
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for a long time for a full coverage Foundation that covered well and had some staying power. I hit the jackpot with this one. I love the way it looks and feels and all of this for the price...a no-brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Grace Whorton

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a multitued of name brand foundations, and I was pleasantly surprised to find this one, at such a reasonable cost. I never would have believed that you could buy this nice of foundation, for this price. I have redness issues and several skin cancer scar issues, and this make-up, does a good job covering them. Would highly recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: 5 starts all the wayy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAIZING product it do what is says, smoooth, it leaves you with even skin, it's not oily as other foundations i had before (i have oily skin) and this product doesn't feel oily at all my only problem is that i choosed the wrong shade because i didn't know how they color thing worked, i'm planning on buying one for my mom next time! :D Psdt: I bought it for my mom it fits her and love it THANK YOU MILANI.
customer_reviews.author: Deborath Tolentino

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color range selection! It has a pretty thick consistency and dries to a matte finish. It can look rather flat on my skin so I mix this with a little bit of facial oil and a dewy formula to create a long-wearing foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: My favorite concealer/foundation I have ever used! Read all the great reviews and still had my doubts, but they were not lying. This make-up lasts so long and covers up what I need it to without looking like I am wearing too much.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Smith

customer_reviews.title: My forever foundation/concealer
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about ordering this online since I've previously gotten it from Walgreens. But it came packaged and seal, in perfect condition. It does tend to wear off during the day but this shade fits me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JaneN

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to try this makeup ,very disappointed wipes right off ,I waited 2 hours after putting it on thought it needed set for awhile ,,doesn't do what it says ,wiped off on my hand ,not waterproof either!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie meeks

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation ever. You can build up on it, it is full coverage or it can be light too, depends how much product you use. Ideal for all skin types. For the price you pay you will surely not find anything better than this foundation. Everyone I have recommended this product to, they ended up loving it. I used to be a makeup artist and I would only use Esteē Lauder double wear makeup which is almost 40 dollars now, Milani offers the same quality except that it is cheaper so it’s a win win! Great buy you will not regret it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great drugstore foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing a Milani product and I absolutely love it! It's lightweight but full coverage. It also holds up against Florida's humidity which is a huge plus. I have oily skin that tends to be very sensitive and this doesn't add any oiliness (like some other foundations I've tried) and so far, no weird reactions from my skin. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

product_meta.title: Milani Conceal + Perfect 2-in-1 Foundation + Concealer - Amber (1 Fl. Oz.) Cruelty-Free Liquid Foundation - Cover Under-Eye Circles, Blemishes & Skin Discoloration for a Flawless Complexion
product_meta.description: Color:11-AmberMilani Conceal + Perfect 2-in-1 Foundation Concealer Amber 1 Ounce
feature_bullets: CONCEAL & PERFECT: Meet the hardest working multi-tasker in your cosmetics bag! Combat under eye circles, redness and other skin imperfections with our water-resistant, foundation + concealer in one perfecting step.
AVAILABLE IN 45 SHADES: Choose from 45 different long-lasting shades to find the one that best matches your skin tone and helps create a naturally flawless complexion.

CRUELTY-FREE BEAUTY: This lush, creamy rich formula applies evenly to perfect and conceal imperfections with a natural looking satin matte finish. Oil-free, medium-to-full coverage, long-wearing & water-resistant for a beautiful, even skin tone.

TIPS & TRICKS: One to two pumps is all you need to create a flawless canvas. Apply to clean, dry skin with even strokes and blend seamlessly into skin. This foundation can also be used with your favorite beauty blender or foundation brush for a silky-smooth finish.

WE ARE MILANI: Born in East LA, we've always been connected to the rich diversity of our neighborhood, because it’s a place that truly embodies the melting pot of Los Angeles. We're not inspired by couture and top models. Our passion is real people, living real lives. Beauty is for everyone. No matter who you are or where you come from, we're here to fuel your self-expression with makeup for every shade, attitude, and ethnicity. No judgment. No exceptions.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
